TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Threading.Tasks.Task Container.ChangesEstimationHandler(long estimatedPendingChanges, CancellationToken cancellationToken);
.class nested public auto ansi sealed Container/ChangesEstimationHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function Container.ChangesEstimationHandler(estimatedPendingChanges As Long, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task
type Container.ChangesEstimationHandler = delegate of int64 * CancellationToken -> Task

Docs.param: An estimation in number of items.
A cancellation token representing the current cancellation status of the instance.
Docs.summary: Delegate to receive the estimation of pending changes to be read by the associated instance.
Docs.returns: A representing the asynchronous operation that is going to be done with the estimation.
